name: Checkout (rotten low, Red-Panda-Productions)
description:
Checkout: A Game by The Minimum Wagers

Ron Liew, Rei Zhang, Charlotte Cook

Ever wanted to be a grocery store clerk? Deal with annoying customers? Get yelled at by your manager?

Probably not.

But hey, someone's gotta do it, and that someone is unfortunately you! Provided you play our game, that is

Checkout is a cashier simulation game that aims to showcase the everyday struggles (especially during the pandemic) of working a minimum wage, underappreciated job. Talk with customers while bagging their items  - make sure not to piss them off, or else your manager might just fire you for bad performance!

We hope you enjoyed your time playing! Please be sure to lock up before leaving for the night.
